DOC.brief_summary: This study looks at isolated pelvic perfusion and limbs' girdle with 1 mg tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNFa) in the treatment of locally advanced sarcoma of the pelvis and limbs’ girdle.
DOC.brief_title: Isolated Pelvic and Limb Perfusion in the Treatment of Locally Advanced Sarcoma of Pelvis and Limbs’ Girdle
DOC.criteria: Soft tissue or bone sarcomas locally advanced of the pelvis or limbs’ girdle Resectable tumor without mutilation
